articles.author: Maegan Vazquez, CNN
articles.title: Biden makes the case for democracies to lead the way on climate crisis during final day in Glasgow - CNN
articles.description: President Joe Biden is spending his final day of his trip to Europe making the case for democracies to lead the way on fighting the climate crisis and announcing new climate-related initiatives at the United Nations summit in Glasgow.
articles.content: (CNN)President Joe Biden is spending his final day of his trip to Europe making the case for democracies to lead the way on fighting the climate crisis and announcing new climate-related initiatives … [+4808 chars]

articles.author: Esther Webber
articles.title: Boris Johnson apologizes after Israeli minister denied wheelchair access to COP26 - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Organizational difficulties have overshadowed early talks at the climate summit.
articles.content:
GLASGOW U.K. Prime Minister Boris Johnson has apologized to an Israeli minister who was unable to access the COP26 summit because of her wheelchair.
